SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT R.* , REPLACE(R.RSPL_NAME, ' ', '') SEARCH_RSPL_NAME , REPLACE(R.RSPL_CTGR, ' ', '') SEARCH_RSPL_CTGR , REPLACE(#{searchKeyword}, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM RSUPPLIES R) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SEARCH_RSPL_NAME LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
AND SEARCH_RSPL_CTGR LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT R.RSPL_ID , R.RSPL_NAME , R.RSPL_CTGR , R.RSPL_PRICE , R.INV_QTY , R.DEL_YN , REPLACE(R.RSPL_NAME, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_RSPL_NAME , REPLACE(R.RSPL_CTGR, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_RSPL_CTGR , REPLACE(#{searchKeyword}, ' ', '') AS SEARCH_KEYWORD FROM RSUPPLIES R) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SEARCH_RSPL_NAME LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
AND SEARCH_RSPL_CTGR LIKE '%' || SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%'
